00035 #define IQR_LIMIT 0.01
00036 /**
00037  * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00038  * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00039  * @return SelfDoc
00040  */
00041 SelfDoc CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::explainSelf()
00042 {
00043     CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio obj;
00044     SelfDoc doc;
00045     doc.setDocName(obj.getType());
00046     doc.setDocDescription(obj.getDescription());
00047     doc.setDocOptions(obj.getDefaultDocOptions());
00048     return doc;
00049 }

00051 /**
00052  * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00053  * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00054  */
00055 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::getDefaultDocOptions()
00056 {
00057   std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00058 
00059   // SelfDoc::Opt(name, type, value, default, min, max, description)
00060   SelfDoc::Opt opt2 = {"gc-correction", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "true", "true", "NA", "NA", "Log2Ratio GC Correction"};
00061   opts.push_back(opt2);
00062 
00063   SelfDoc::Opt opt3 = {"median-autosome-median-normalization", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "true", "true", "NA", "NA", "Log2Ratio Median Autosmome Median Normalization"};
00064   opts.push_back(opt3);
00065 
00066   SelfDoc::Opt opt4 = {"median-smooth-marker-count", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "5", "5", "3", "NA", "Log2Ratio Median Smooth marker count."};
00067   opts.push_back(opt4);
00068 
00069   return opts;
00070 }

00072 /**
00073  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00074  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00075  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00076  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00077  *
00078  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00079  *
00080  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00081  */
00082 SelfCreate* CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00083 {
00084     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00085     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00086     CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio* pMethod = new CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio();
00087     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00088 
00089     pMethod->m_bGCCorrection = setupBoolParameter("gc-correction", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00090     pMethod->m_bMedianAutosomeMedianNormalization = setupBoolParameter("median-autosome-median-normalization", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00091     pMethod->m_iMedianSmoothWindowSize = setupIntParameter("median-smooth-marker-count", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00092 
00093     return pMethod;
00094 }

00097  * @brief Constructor
00098  */
00099 CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio()
00100 {
00101     m_dYTarget = 0;
00102     m_bGCCorrection = true;
00103     m_bMedianAutosomeMedianNormalization = true;
00104     m_iMedianSmoothWindowSize = 0;
00105     m_dTrimLow = 0;
00106     m_dTrimHigh = 0;
00107     m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined=false;

00109 
00110 void CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::determineLocalProbeSets()
00111 {
00112     if(m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined)
00113     {
00114         return;
00115     }
00116     const bool isCytoScanHD = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cytoscan-hd");
00117     int iNumberOfProbeSets=CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getCount();
00118     for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex<iNumberOfProbeSets; iIndex++)
00119     {
00120         if( CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex)->processAll() )
00121         {
00122             if (isCytoScanHD && (!CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex)->processAsCN())) {continue;}
00123             getProbeSets()->add( CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex));
00124         }
00125     }
00126     m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined=true;
00127 }

00129 /**
00130  * @brief Run the analysis.
00131  */
00132 void CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::run()
00133 {
00134 //    Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::run(...) start");
00135     isSetup();
00136     m_dYTarget = m_pEngine->getOptDouble("yTarget");
00137 //    Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::run(...) ", 5, 1, 5);
00138 
00139     determineLocalProbeSets();
00140 
00141     bool cytoScanHD = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cytoscan-hd");
00142 
00143     // if cytoScanHD == true => adjustYTarget == false.  yTarget adjustment is done later by applyYTargetAdjustment().
00144     calculateLog2Ratios(!cytoScanHD);
00145 
00146         highPassFilterLog2Ratios();
00147 
00148     adjustUsingCovariateLRAdjustment();
00149 
00150     applyWaveCorrection();
00151 //    Verbose::progressStep(1);
00152     if (m_bGCCorrection)
00153     {
00154         GCCorrection(getExperiment());
00155     }
00156 
00157     if (cytoScanHD) {applyYTargetAdjustment();}
00158 
00159 //    Verbose::progressStep(1);
00160     if (m_bMedianAutosomeMedianNormalization)
00161     {
00162         calculateMedianAutosomeMedian(getExperiment());
00163 //        Verbose::progressStep(1);
00164         normalizeLog2Ratios(getExperiment());
00165     }
00166 //    Verbose::progressStep(1);
00167     calculateQCMetrics(getExperiment());
00168     getProbeSets()->calculateLog2RatioMedianSmooth(m_iMedianSmoothWindowSize);
00169 //    Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00170 //    Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::run(...) end");
00171 }
00172 
00173 /**
00174  * Calculate the log2 ratios.
00175  * The data is processed by experiment meaning the all the probe set data is processed for a given experiment.
00176  * Note that the signal is A + B.
00177  * @param int - The col index.
00178  * @param int - The experiment index.
00179  */
00180 void CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::calculateLog2Ratios(bool adjustYTarget)
00181 {
00182 //    Verbose::out(3, "CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::calculateLog2Ratios");
00183     double yTarget = ((adjustYTarget == true) ? m_dYTarget : 0.0);
00184     
00185     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00186     {
00187         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00188         double dSignal = (pobjProbeSet->getAAlleleSignal() + pobjProbeSet->getBAlleleSignal());
00189         double dLog2Ratio = 0;
00190         if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == m_iXChromosome)
00191         {
00192             dLog2Ratio = log2(dSignal / pobjProbeSet->getXXMedianSignal());
00193         }
00194         else if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == m_iYChromosome)
00195         {
00196             dLog2Ratio = log2(dSignal / pobjProbeSet->getYMedianSignal()) + yTarget;
00197         }
00198         else // Autosome
00199         {
00200             dLog2Ratio = log2(dSignal / pobjProbeSet->getMedianSignal());
00201         }
00202         pobjProbeSet->setLog2Ratio((float)dLog2Ratio);
00203     }
00204 }
00205 
00206 void CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::applyYTargetAdjustment()
00207 {
00208     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00209     {
00210         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00211         if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == m_iYChromosome)
00212         {
00213             double dLog2Ratio = pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio() + m_dYTarget;
00214             pobjProbeSet->setLog2Ratio((float)dLog2Ratio);
00215         }
00216     }
00217 }
00218 
00219 /**
00220  * Apply the GC content correction. This is used to reduce wavyness in the smoothed log2 ratios.
00221  * The data is processed by experiment meaning the all the probe set data is processed for a given experiment.
00222  * @param int - The col index.
00223  * @param int - The experiment index.
00224  */
00225 void CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::GCCorrection(CNExperiment* pobjExperiment)
00226 {
00227 //    Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioData::GCCorrection");
00228 
00229 
00230     // This functionality was moved here from the original location in the Annotations file read.
00231     // Since we do GC correction on a subset of the probesets we allow the module to determine which
00232     // probe sets to use via the local choice in getProbeSets.
00233     getProbeSets()->setupGCCorrectionBins(m_pEngine->getOptInt("gc-correction-bin-count"));
00234 
00235 
00236     int iEnzymeCount = 0;
00237     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& vLog2RatiosBeforeCorrection = getV2();
00238     std::vector<int> vBinIndexes(getProbeSets()->getCount());
00239     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00240     {
00241         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00242         if ((pobjProbeSet->isSty()) || (pobjProbeSet->isNsp())) {iEnzymeCount++;}
00243         vLog2RatiosBeforeCorrection.set(iRowIndex, pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio());
00244         vBinIndexes[iRowIndex] = pobjProbeSet->getGCBinIndex();
00245     }
00246     // calculateIqr uses V1
00247     double dOldIqr = calculateIqr();
00248 
00249     if (iEnzymeCount == 0)
00250     {
00251         processMarkerGroupGCCorrection(true, false, false, vBinIndexes);
00252         processMarkerGroupGCCorrection(false, false, false, vBinIndexes);
00253     }
00254     else
00255     {
00256         processMarkerGroupGCCorrection(true, true, false, vBinIndexes);
00257         processMarkerGroupGCCorrection(true, false, true, vBinIndexes);
00258         processMarkerGroupGCCorrection(true, true, true, vBinIndexes);
00259         processMarkerGroupGCCorrection(true, false, false, vBinIndexes);
00260         processMarkerGroupGCCorrection(false, true, false, vBinIndexes);
00261         processMarkerGroupGCCorrection(false, false, true, vBinIndexes);
00262         processMarkerGroupGCCorrection(false, true, true, vBinIndexes);
00263         processMarkerGroupGCCorrection(false, false, false, vBinIndexes);
00264     }
00265 
00266     double dNewIqr = calculateIqr();
00267     float fLog2Ratio = 0;
00268     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00269     {
00270         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00271         fLog2Ratio = pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio();
00272         if (dNewIqr != 0) {fLog2Ratio *= (dOldIqr / dNewIqr);}
00273         pobjProbeSet->setLog2Ratio(fLog2Ratio);
00274     }
00275     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& vLog2RatioCorrectionDifferences = getV3();
00276     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00277     {
00278         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00279         fLog2Ratio = pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio();
00280         vLog2RatioCorrectionDifferences.set(iRowIndex, fabs(vLog2RatiosBeforeCorrection.get(iRowIndex) - fLog2Ratio));
00281     }
00282     pobjExperiment->setGCCorrectionMetric((float)vLog2RatioCorrectionDifferences.median());
00283 }
00284 
00285 /**
00286  * @brief Process the marker group for GC correction
00287  * @param bool - Is the marker group SNPs
00288  * @param bool - Is the marker group Sty
00289  * @param bool - Is the marker group Nsp
00290  */
00291 void CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::processMarkerGroupGCCorrection(bool bSnp, bool bSty, bool bNsp, std::vector<int>& vBinIndexes)
00292 {
00293     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& vLog2Ratios = getV4();
00294     float fLog2Ratio = 0;
00295     int iMarkerCount = 0;
00296     double dPrevMedian = 0;
00297     std::vector<int> vProbeSetIndexes(getProbeSets()->getCount());
00298     for (int iBinIndex = 0; (iBinIndex < m_pEngine->getOptInt("gc-correction-bin-count")); iBinIndex++)
00299     {
00300         int iIndex = 0;
00301         iMarkerCount = 0;
00302         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00303         {
00304             if (vBinIndexes[iRowIndex] == iBinIndex)
00305             {
00306                 CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00307                 if (isInGCCorrectionGroup(*pobjProbeSet, (m_iXChromosome - 1), bSnp, bSty, bNsp, iBinIndex))
00308                 {
00309                     fLog2Ratio = pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio();
00310                     vLog2Ratios.set(iMarkerCount, fLog2Ratio);
00311                     vProbeSetIndexes[iMarkerCount] = iRowIndex;
00312                     iMarkerCount++;
00313                 }
00314                 if (isInGCCorrectionGroup(*pobjProbeSet, m_iYChromosome, bSnp, bSty, bNsp, iBinIndex))  // apply to autosomes and sex chroms.
00315                 {
00316                     vProbeSetIndexes[iIndex] = iRowIndex;
00317                     iIndex++;
00318                 }
00319             }
00320         }
00321         if (iIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()) {vProbeSetIndexes[iIndex] = -1;}
00322         double dMedian = vLog2Ratios.median(iMarkerCount);
00323         if (dMedian != dMedian) {dMedian = dPrevMedian;} // Check for NaN
00324         if (dMedian != dMedian) {dMedian = 0;}
00325         dPrevMedian = dMedian;
00326 
00327         iMarkerCount = 0;
00328         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00329         {
00330             if (vProbeSetIndexes[iRowIndex] == -1) {break;}
00331             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(vProbeSetIndexes[iRowIndex]);
00332             pobjProbeSet->setGcAdjustment((float)dMedian);
00333             fLog2Ratio = pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio();
00334             fLog2Ratio -= dMedian;
00335             pobjProbeSet->setLog2Ratio(fLog2Ratio);
00336             vLog2Ratios.set(iMarkerCount, fLog2Ratio);
00337             iMarkerCount++;
00338         }
00339         // Took out bug where if medain == 0 the continue.
00340         double dIqr = (vLog2Ratios.percentile(0.75, iMarkerCount) - vLog2Ratios.percentile(0.25, iMarkerCount));
00341         if (((-IQR_LIMIT <= dIqr) && (dIqr <= IQR_LIMIT)) || (dIqr != dIqr)) {continue;}
00342         for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00343         {
00344             if (vProbeSetIndexes[iRowIndex] == -1) {break;}
00345             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(vProbeSetIndexes[iRowIndex]);
00346             fLog2Ratio = pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio();
00347             if (dIqr != 0) {fLog2Ratio /= dIqr;}
00348             pobjProbeSet->setLog2Ratio(fLog2Ratio);
00349         }
00350     }
00351 }
00352 
00353 /**
00354  * @brief Is the probe set belong to the marker group
00355  * @param CNProbeSet& - The specified probe set
00356  * @param int - The last autosome chromosome
00357  * @param bool - Is the marker group SNPs
00358  * @param bool - Is the marker group Sty
00359  * @param bool - Is the marker group Nsp
00360  * @param int - The marker group GC content bin index
00361  */
00362 bool CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::isInGCCorrectionGroup(CNProbeSet& objProbeSet, int iLastAutosomeChromosome, bool bSnp, bool bSty, bool bNsp, int iBinIndex)
00363 {
00364     return ((objProbeSet.getChromosome() <= iLastAutosomeChromosome) &&
00365         (objProbeSet.processAsSNP() == bSnp) && ((objProbeSet.isSty() == bSty) && (objProbeSet.isNsp() == bNsp)) &&
00366         (objProbeSet.getGCBinIndex() == iBinIndex));
00367 }
00368 
00369 /**
00370  * Calcuate the median autosome median. This is used to normalize the log2 ratios.
00371  * The data is processed by experiment meaning the all the probe set data is processed for a given experiment.
00372  * @param CNExperiment* - The experiment to process
00373  */
00374 void CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::calculateMedianAutosomeMedian(CNExperiment* pobjExperiment)
00375 {
00376 //    Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioData::calculateMedianAutosomeMedian in");
00377     int iLastAutosomeChromosome = getLastAutosomeChromosome();
00378     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<int> vChrCounts(iLastAutosomeChromosome);
00379     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<int> vChrIndexes(iLastAutosomeChromosome);
00380     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vChrMedians(iLastAutosomeChromosome);
00381     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>* pvar = new AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>[iLastAutosomeChromosome];
00382     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00383     {
00384         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00385         if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() <= 0) {continue;}
00386         if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() <= iLastAutosomeChromosome)
00387         {
00388             vChrCounts.increment(pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() - 1);
00389         }
00390     }
00391     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iLastAutosomeChromosome); iIndex++)
00392     {
00393         pvar[iIndex].initialize(vChrCounts.get(iIndex));
00394     }
00395     vChrIndexes.initialize();
00396     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00397     {
00398         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00399         if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() <= 0) {continue;}
00400         if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() <= iLastAutosomeChromosome)
00401         {
00402             pvar[pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() - 1].set(vChrIndexes.get(pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() - 1), pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio());
00403             vChrIndexes.increment(pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() - 1);
00404         }
00405     }
00406     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iLastAutosomeChromosome); iIndex++)
00407     {
00408         vChrMedians.set(iIndex, (float)pvar[iIndex].median());
00409     }
00410     pobjExperiment->setMedianAutosomeMedian((float)vChrMedians.finiteMedian());
00411     delete[] pvar;
00412 //    Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioData::calculateMedianAutosomeMedian out");
00413 }
00414 
00415 /**
00416  * Normalize the log2 ratios by subtracting out the median autosome median.
00417  * The data is processed by experiment meaning the all the probe set data is processed for a given experiment.
00418  * @param CNExperiment* - The experiment to process
00419  */
00420 void CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::normalizeLog2Ratios(CNExperiment* pobjExperiment)
00421 {
00422 //    Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioData::normalizeLog2Ratios");
00423     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00424     {
00425         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00426         pobjProbeSet->setLog2Ratio((float)(pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio() - pobjExperiment->getMedianAutosomeMedian()));
00427     }
00428 }
00429 
00430 /**
00431  * Trim the log2 ratios.
00432  * The data is processed by experiment meaning the all the probe set data is processed for a given experiment.
00433  * @param CNExperiment* - The experiment to process
00434  */
00435 void CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::trim()
00436 {
00437 //    Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioData::normalizeLog2Ratios");
00438     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00439     {
00440         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00441         float fLog2Ratio = pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio();
00442         if (fLog2Ratio > m_dTrimHigh) {fLog2Ratio = m_dTrimHigh;}
00443         else if (fLog2Ratio < m_dTrimLow) {fLog2Ratio = m_dTrimLow;}
00444         pobjProbeSet->setLog2Ratio(fLog2Ratio);
00445     }
00446 }
00447 
00448 /**
00449  * Calcuate the only the iqr QC Metric.
00450  */
00451 double CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::calculateIqr()
00452 {
00453     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& v = getV1();
00454     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00455     {
00456         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00457         v.set(iRowIndex, pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio());
00458     }
00459     return (v.percentile(0.75, getProbeSets()->getCount()) - v.percentile(0.25, getProbeSets()->getCount()));
00460 }
00461 
00462 /**
00463  * Calcuate the QC Metrics.
00464  * The data is processed by experiment meaning the all the probe set data is processed for a given experiment.
00465  * @param CNExperiment* - The experiment to process
00466  */
00467 void CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::calculateQCMetrics(CNExperiment* pobjExperiment)
00468 {
00469 //    Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioData::calculateQCMetrics");
00470     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& vAbsDiff = getV1();
00471     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& v = getV2();
00472     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00473     {
00474         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00475         v.set(iRowIndex, pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio());
00476     }
00477     // m_arProbeSetsAlternateSort order is Chromosome, Position
00478     int iCount = 0;
00479     for (int iRowIndex = 1; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00480     {
00481         CNProbeSet* pobjPrevProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex - 1);
00482         CNProbeSet* pobjNextProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00483         if (pobjPrevProbeSet->getChromosome() == pobjNextProbeSet->getChromosome())
00484         {
00485             vAbsDiff.set(iCount, fabs(pobjNextProbeSet->getLog2Ratio() - pobjPrevProbeSet->getLog2Ratio()));
00486             iCount++;
00487         }
00488     }
00489     pobjExperiment->setMadDiffCN((float)vAbsDiff.median(iCount));
00490     pobjExperiment->setIqr((float)(v.percentile(0.75, getProbeSets()->getCount()) - v.percentile(0.25, getProbeSets()->getCount())));
00491 
00492     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>& vAbs = getV1();
00493     iCount = 0;
00494     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00495     {
00496         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00497         float fLog2Ratio = pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio();
00498         vAbs.set(iCount, fabs(fLog2Ratio));
00499         iCount++;
00500     }
00501     pobjExperiment->setMeanAbsRle(vAbs.mean(iCount));
00502 }
00503 
00504 void CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::applyWaveCorrection()
00505 {
00506     if (!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method")) {return;}
00507     if (m_pEngine->getOpt("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method") == "none") {return;}
00508     if (m_pEngine->getOpt("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method") == "") {return;}
00509 
00510     CNAnalysisMethodFactory amFactory;
00511     CNAnalysisMethod* am = NULL;
00512     am = amFactory.CNAnalysisMethodForString(m_pEngine->getOpt("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method"));
00513     am->setEngine(m_pEngine);
00514     am->setup(*getExperiment(), *CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets());
00515     am->run();
00516     delete am;
00517 }
00518 
00519 void CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::adjustUsingCovariateLRAdjustment()
00520 {
00521     if (m_pEngine->getEngineName() != "CNCytoEngine")
00522     {
00523         return;
00524     }
00525     CNAnalysisMethodFactory amFactory;
00526     CNAnalysisMethod* am = NULL;
00527     am = amFactory.CNAnalysisMethodForString("covariate-lr-adjuster");
00528     am->setEngine(m_pEngine);
00529     am->setup(*getExperiment(), *getProbeSets());
00530     am->run();
00531     delete am;
00532 }
00533 
00534 void CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio::highPassFilterLog2Ratios()
00535 {
00536     if (!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("log2ratio-adjustment-method")) {return;}
00537     if (m_pEngine->getOpt("log2ratio-adjustment-method") == "none") {return;}
00538     if (m_pEngine->getOpt("log2ratio-adjustment-method") == "") {return;}
00539 
00540     CNAnalysisMethodFactory amFactory;
00541     CNAnalysisMethod* am = NULL;
00542     am = amFactory.CNAnalysisMethodForString(m_pEngine->getOpt("log2ratio-adjustment-method"));
00543     am->setEngine(m_pEngine);
00544     am->setup(*getExperiment(),*CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets(),getProbes());
00545     am->run();
00546 
00547     delete am;
00548 }
